response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to me and its perceived worth to you, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.", "product_price": 12000}
